channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: United States vs Burkina Faso: How to Watch, U-17 World Cup Preview
item.description: Preview United States vs Burkina Faso in the FIFA U-17 World Cup with TV info, start time, and more ahead of kickoff.

item.title: 'They Aren't Very Smart': Matt Painter Defends Fletcher Loyer After 30-Point Opener
item.description: Purdue head coach Matt Painter took a shot at Fletcher Loyer’s doubters after the guard’s 30-point performance against Evansville.

item.title: Takai Simpkins makes TOUGH go-ahead lay-up in Oregon’s 60-59 win over Hawai'i
item.description: Takai Simpkins made a tough, go-ahead lay-up as the Oregon Ducks won 60-59 over the Hawai'i Rainbow Warriors.

item.title: Magic's Bane tossed after firing ball at Okongwu
item.description: Desmond Bane was ejected Tuesday after committing a hard foul on Onyeka Okongwu and firing the ball at the Hawks' center while he fell to the floor.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid plot Vinícius Júnior exit
item.description: Vinícius Júnior's days at Real Madrid could be numbered. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.
